text: (born February 15, 1911 Tokyo, Japan, died July 26, 1983) was a Japanese film director from the 1950s to 1970s. He directed at least six films about Zatoichi, the Blind Swordsman and Yokai Monsters: Along With Ghosts. == References == Category:1911 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Japanese movie directors
title: Kimiyoshi Yasuda
